Class CompositionCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.sys.ccc.CompositionCompiler
  • public class CompositionCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    ERSAP compiler. Compiles the application logical description, i.e. simple/conditional routing schema in a sets of instructions for a specified service. Below is an example of the application code, written in the
